snippet: U.S. Steel and the United Steelworkers union announced a tentative agreement Sunday on a three-year contract covering more than 16,000 workers at domestic plants.
abstract: US Steel and the United Steelworkers union announce a tentative agreement on a three-year contract covering more than 16,000 workers at domestic plants.
lead_paragraph: U.S. Steel and the United Steelworkers union announced a tentative agreement Sunday on a three-year contract covering more than 16,000 workers at domestic plants.

headline.seo: U.S. Steel and United Steelworkers Union Reach Tentative Deal
headline.main: U.S. Steel Reaches Deal With Union
headline.print_headline: U.S. Steel Reaches Deal With Union
